name: "Pink is Pretty" Infinity Scarf
description:
Pink is Pretty. Pink is Bright.
I've made a decision to help the fight!

$10 from every "Pink is Pretty" scarf purchase will be donated to The Strecker Cancer at Marietta Memorial Hospital.

The 54" loop combines three of Nikki's exclusive designs into one scarf to symbolize the fact that every patient and every story is unique. 

100% polyester. Wash separately in cool or warm water using a gentle machine cycle. Machine dry using a low temperature or permanent press setting and remove promptly to avoid wrinkles. If required, use an iron with a light touch on a synthetic setting only. 

PLEASE NOTE: Items available for shipment beginning October 15.

name: Obi Belt Black
description:
Nikki has a theory about patterns: one is never enough. These belts are reversible to showcase a unique print on each side and even a third for the ties. The sleek cinching effect is an added bonus.

Main: 24.5" x 4," Ties: 42." 
The Obi Belt combines Halo Effect, Gemstone and Rose Nouveau— exclusive prints designed by Nikki Butler. 
Certified organic cotton by Global Organic Textile Standards (GOTS). Spot clean. Air-dry.

Pictured with Resort Shirt and Clutch Purse (not included).

name: Resort Shirt Black
description:
Crafted of lightweight cotton voile and finished with carefully designed touches like a coordinating border print and delicately reinforced side stitching, it has a slightly bohemian vibe.

Body length: 26"
The Resort shirt combines Halo Effect and Rose Nouveau exclusive prints designed by Nikki Butler. Dry clean or hand wash gently, warm or cool using phosphate-free detergent. Air-dry.

Pictured with optional Obi-Belt and Clutch Purse (not included)

name: Halo Effect About Town Skirt
description:
Rendered in certified organic cotton, this skirt’s comfort 
has us wearing it straight from a board meeting to a ball 
game. We’re as smitten with its happy hues as we are with 
its hidden side pockets—featuring coordinating prints no less.

Pull-on styling.
S-22" long, M-24" long, L-26" long. 
Halo Effect in an exclusive print designed by Nikki Butler and is available in Black or Pink. 

Certified organic cotton by Global Organic Textile Standards (GOTS). Machine wash warm or cool using phosphate-free detergent.

name: Halo Effect Clutch Purse
description:
The must-have accessory that nods to vintage, but feels completely of the moment.

8" metal handle with shiny, silver finish. 
Fully lined with inside pocket. 
Halo Effect is an exclusive print designed by Nikki Butler and is available in pink or black.

Outer: Certified organic cotton by Global Organic Textile Standards (GOTS). Lining: 100% polyester. Spot clean. Air-dry.

name: Gemstone Infinity Scarf
description:
The versatility of this infinity scarf never ends! The 54" loop of airy, cotton voile adds a brilliant pop of color to any ensemble.

Gemstone is an exclusive print designed by Nikki Butler and is available in Green, Blue or Gray. 
Dry clean or hand wash gently, warm or cool using phosphate-free detergent. Air-dry.

name: Blue & Gold WV Infinity Scarf
description:
Featured in Morgantown and WV Living magazines!
The versatility of this infinity scarf never ends! The 54" loop of lightweight, cotton voile looks just as fabulous with a tee for game day as it does a with a dress for spirit day at the office.

Available in Blue & Gold WV and 12-Point Star. Both are original designs by Nikki Butler. 

Dry clean or hand wash gently, warm or cool using phosphate-free detergent. Air-dry.

name: Bloom Pillow
description:
Plant this bright flower pillow on your bed and you're sure to wake up happy! A generous 20" of Heavy Cotton Twill with 100% pure polyester fiberfill filling. Non-allergenic.

For best results, dry clean only. We recommend using GreenEarth Cleaning or any other dry cleaning method that does not use the solvent perchloroethylene (perc).

name: Fiesta Napkins, set of two
description:
Sold in a set of two, these clever dinner napkins allow you to mix up your table setting every night! The fabric is engineered in such a way that folded one direction they reveal one set of colors and folded the opposite way they reveal an entirely different set of colors. So, whether you're matchy-matchy or prefer a more eclectic look—these 17" napkins are made to entertain! 

Certified organic cotton by Global Organic Textile Standards (GOTS). Machine wash warm or cool using phosphate-free detergent.

The fabric is a compilation of Fiesta, a collection of original designs by Nikki Butler.

name: Arrow-Fold Napkins, set of two
description:
Sold in a set of two, these clever dinner napkins allow you to mix up your table setting every night! The fabric is engineered in such a way that folded one direction they reveal one set of colors and folded the opposite way they reveal an entirely different set of colors. So, whether you're matchy-matchy or prefer a more eclectic look—these 17" napkins are made to entertain! 

Certified organic cotton by Global Organic Textile Standards (GOTS). Machine wash warm or cool using phosphate-free detergent.

Available in Bright or Muted color schemes. The fabric is a compilation of Deconstructed Damask, an original design by Nikki Butler.
